reviewText:
Loved this Chinese Drama. Very good story and touching.

The actors are superb, although the characters at times feel a little bit unbelievable, the actors make them look real.

There is plenty of comedy and drama that will satisfy most.

Highly recommend this one, as well as the Korean remake (which has a song in its soundtrack).
I paid $50 something dollars for this DVD Box Set.  It is fine except for some episodes have wrong subtitles.

I really liked this movie.  It started really silly, but turned into a very good story. I even cried by eyes out at one point because you felt their pain, frustration and anger. It held my attention to the point I stayed up all night watching it.

I am completely disappointed with the video I bought because the english interpretations are horrible. If I hadn't viewed it in advance, I would not have been able to figure out what was being said.  Please screen the videos before they are sent out. So Sad.

Good storyline. Love the drama from beginning to end. I have watched several taiwanese drama and this one is my 2nd best favorite next to autumn concerto. i did purchase the original deluxe dvd from malaysia unfortunately there is just one comment about the dvd... picture perfect but there were certain chapters that the english sub is just lousy.... 'can't understand a bit of the conversation. the gist was there but some of the subs .... bad. if they could only just review the english sub and redo it again, i would buy another one to add to my ever growing collection.
I seriously love this series! It's hilarious, it's depressing, it leaves you cheering and booing for characters respectively. When is it going to be available for purchase?
